TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the game crashes every time you try to play it.

I wish to be able to not have to eat or drink for the rest of my life.

Granted, but then you become comatized for the rest of your life.

I wish for KSP to get new planets.

granted, but all them looks the same, are gilly sized and have a krakened jool surface

I wish for free gamer edition ksp

Granted, but it blows up.

I wish for a waffle.

Granted, but it's miscolored.

I wish for a can of chili.

You get a can of Chile.

I wish there were 48 hours to the day.

You get a can of Chile.

I wish there were 48 hours to the day.

Granted, but then you can't sleep.

No wish granted.

I wish for chocolate.

Granted. It's also exploding chocolate.

I wish for every single process in the universe to be faster than joining a server.

Granted, but the universe ends in a day, not trillions of years from now.

I wish for me to be a tyrant that rules the world (the nice tyrant, not the jerk)

Granted, however, everyone else on the world gets the impression that the tyrant is the jerk.

I wish for atmospheric fluid spectro-variometer to actually measure pressure and temperature.

Granted. The stock thermometers and barometers are useless junk, and the spectro-variometer is the last thing you unlock in the tech tree for all tech trees.

I wish for a big jet engine.

Granted, but you never asked for the fuel for it, you aint going anywhere.

I wish for a..... faster computer. Hell, THE fastest computer.

Granted, But you only have access to dial-up internet.

I wish for I could speak all the languages in the world.

Granted, but you always mix up the words.

I wish for a potato!

Granted, but your computer IS the potato (inception music)

I wish for a mansion with a water park in Florida!

Granted, but the mansion is haunted and there is always a storm with lightning above the waterpark.

I wish be awesome

Granted. Webster gets confused.

I wish I knew what I was talking about all the time rather than just when I care.

Granted. All you can think about is what you are taking about, and you can spare no thought for anything else.

I wish for a Morgan Freeman voiceover I can turn on whenever I feel like it!

Granted. Your voiceover has Tourette's.

I wish for coffee.

Now that I had my coffee, I can finally read and see subtle things missed earlier:

I wish you a cordial welcome to the forums! :-D

Edited July 13, 2015 by heng

Granted, however, the subject of your welcome mysteriously vanishes into thin air.

I wish for 1 solar eclipse approximately every month.

Granted, however, the subject of your welcome mysteriously vanishes into thin air.

I wish for 1 solar eclipse approximately every month.

Granted, but looking directly at it makes you blind.

I wish for rep.

Granted, you get negative rep like GrEeN IrOn CrOwN.

I wish for ice cream

Granted. It is industrial-waste flavoured and you get poisoned eating it.

I wish for a more stable and more powerful computer.

Granted. It is so powerful that when you plug it in, in shorts out the entire electrical system within a 300 mile radius.

I wish for a 9-volt battery.

Granted. It's out of charge and it is not rechargable.

I wish for tape cassette

Edited July 13, 2015 by TrainEngie
